attributes.action: Waive the congestion charge on days when there is a public transport strike.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On days when there is a strike in the public transport services, people who would normally use these services are forced to take their cars to work. It cannot be right that they are further penalised by having to pay a congestion charge.

rejection.details: The Congestion Charge is controlled by the Mayor of London's Office: http://www.london.gov.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
